notes:
Rahemos, a great conjurer, was sentenced to be locked away, after his part in the conspiracies against the pharaoh. He is guarded by a [[Warlock]] and a [[Magicthrower]]. He spawns even with players in his room.

{{JSpoiler|One of the Pharaohs of [[The Ancient Tombs Quest]].}}
sounds: It's not a trick, it's Rahemos.
I will make you believe in magic.
name: Rahemos
behaviour: Malicious, he will make all efforts to destroy intruders.
strategy: He uses strong magic attacks, so use [[blocker]]s to run around him and [[distance]] fighters to fire on him. Due to his high magic resistance and notable weakness to physical damage, it is highly recommended for mages to use [[Explosion]] runes (Druids can combine this with [[Physical Strike]]). Higher level knights can easily solo Rahemos with a couple of quick [[Fierce Berserk]]s, [[Front Sweep]]s and an [[Annihilation]] spell. A [[Demon Skeleton]] can be summoned to draw attention from the [[Magicthrower]] as well as deal extra damage to Rahemos.
